TestInformation.Title: Counter-Strike Source
TestInformation.Description: This is a benchmark of Valve's Counter-Strike: Source game. The test profile assumes you have a Steam account, have Steam installed for the system, and that Counter-Strike: Source is already installed. This automates the process of executing the game and using a standardized time demo.
TestInformation.PreInstallMessage: This test will attempt to install the necessary game using your Steam account. If the test appears hung you may need to manually exit the Steam client.
